full_summary:
===============

### National Defence Tender Notice

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01024283
**Publication Date**: February 1, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 3, 2023, 2:00 pm EST

### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence seeks proposals for the procurement of Inflatable Seals, a component used in ship and boat propulsion systems. The requirement includes two items with specific NSN and GSIN codes, as outlined below:

#### Item 1:

* **NSN**: 01-3083010
* **GSIN**: N2010
* **Description**: Inflatable Seal (Part No.: 10-1843, NCAGE: 54686 SEAL MASTER CORPORATION)
* **Quantity**: 3 units
* **Delivery Location**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt

#### Item 2:

* **NSN**: 01-3083010
* **GSIN**: N2010
* **Description**: Inflatable Seal (Part No.: 10-1843, NCAGE: 54686 SEAL MASTER CORPORATION)
* **Quantity**: 3 units
* **Delivery Location**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax

### Proposal Requirements

Bidders are required to submit a proposal for the provision of the specified inflatable seals. Proposals must include the following:

* Brand name and model, or Part Number and NCAGE for Equivalent or Substitute Products
* Prices in Canadian dollars (foreign currency bids will not be accepted)
* Preference for Canadian goods and/or services
* Compliance with the documentation requirements stated in the procurement notice

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **Contact Name**: Johan Vizcaya Collado
* **Contact Email**: [johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca](mailto:johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

### Additional Information

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Document Reference:
	+ English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/af438ff24938ee41cf59ac4f08716086/rfp_w8482-
